text: Va agar Alloh taolo mardumro ʙa saʙaʙi on ci kardaand, muçozot mekard, heç çunʙandaero ʙar puşti zamin ʙoqī nameguzoşt, ammo [muhlat medihad va kajfari] ononro to saromadi muajjane ʙa ta'xir meandozad; pas, hangome ki açalaşon [dar qijomat] faro rasad, jaqinan, Alloh taolo ʙa holi ʙandagonaş ʙinost
